meaningMnemonic: You take some <radical>thread</radical>, put your <radical>scooter</radical> up to a <radical>signpost</radical>, and <kanji>sew</kanji> them together. You don't have a lock, so sewing your scooter up to the signpost to keep it safe is all you can think of.
readingMnemonic: You usually only <kanji>sew</kanji> at <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう), so this is a big exception for you. You're usually worried that if you sew in public people will judge your stitches, so this is a big step for you!
